channel.title: 317 pi char backups
channel.description:
how would i make it to where players can do ::save and it makes a backup of their character.. and if they get reset an admin or owner can do ::restore (playername) to set it to thier last saved backup?
if not then is there a way i can make playersave.java sava all characters on logout also to another folder named characters2?
